block.field: enable step if ticket is ready to be worked on

block.comment: Checks if a REq has at least one TC traced
each req of a SubWP needs to trace to a highlevel requirement

block.field: for each req we check whether
from its upstream elements, at least one is of type HighlevelReq
for each req we check whether
from its downsteam elements, at least one is of type Testcase
